comment: Congratulations!! Thanks also to Katalin Karik the next Nobel Prize in Biology
amr:
# ::snt Congratulations!! Thanks also to Katalin Karik the next Nobel Prize in Biology
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / congratulate-01
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (t / thank-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Katalin"
                        :op2 "Karik"))
            :ARG2 (a / award
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Nobel"
                        :op2 "Prize"
                        :op3 "in"
                        :op4 " biology")
                  :mod (n3 / next))
            :mod (a2 / also)))
